description: This Dashboard provides a general overview of a BEAM VM

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "erlang_vm_statistics_wallclock_time_milliseconds" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently used for atoms
targets.query: SELECT mean("used") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_atom_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently allocated and not used by atoms
targets.query: SELECT mean("free") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_atom_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently used by the Erlang processes
targets.query: SELECT mean("used") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_processes_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently allocated and not used by the Erlang processes
targets.query: SELECT mean("free") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_processes_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently used by the Erlang processes
targets.query: SELECT mean("processes") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently allocated for the emulator that is not directly related to any Erlang process
targets.query: SELECT mean("system") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Number of all ETS tables at the node
targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_ets_tables" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Number of all DETS tables at the node
targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_dets_tables" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently allocated for atoms
targets.query: SELECT mean("atom") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_system_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently allocated for binaries
targets.query: SELECT mean("binary") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_system_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently allocated for Erlang code
targets.query: SELECT mean("code") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_system_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently allocated for ETS tables
targets.query: SELECT mean("ets") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_system_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently allocated for the emulator that is not directly related to any Erlang process
targets.query: SELECT mean("system") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_system_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Amount of memory currently allocated for other purposes
targets.query: SELECT mean("other") FROM "erlang_vm_memory_system_bytes_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Total number of context switches
targets.query: SELECT spread("value") FROM "erlang_vm_statistics_context_switches" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Total number of bytes output to ports
targets.query: SELECT spread("value") FROM "erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_output_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Total number of bytes received through ports
targets.query: SELECT spread("value") FROM "erlang_vm_statistics_bytes_received_total" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Sum of the runtime for all threads in the Erlang runtime system
targets.query: SELECT spread("value") FROM "erlang_vm_statistics_runtime_milliseconds" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Bytes reclaimed during GC
targets.query: SELECT spread("value") FROM "erlang_vm_statistics_garbage_collection_bytes_reclaimed" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Number of GCs
targets.query: SELECT spread("value") FROM "erlang_vm_statistics_garbage_collection_number_of_gcs" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Dirty CPU run queue length
targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "erlang_vm_statistics_dirty_cpu_run_queue_length" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Dirty IO run queue length
targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "erlang_vm_statistics_dirty_io_run_queue_length" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Length of all normal run-queues
targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "erlang_vm_statistics_run_queues_length" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Number of atoms currently existing at the local node
targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "erlang_vm_atom_count" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Number of atoms currently existing at the local node
targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "erlang_vm_port_count" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: Number of processes currently existing at the local node
targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "erlang_vm_process_count" WHERE "device_id" =~ /^$VM$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

list.name: VM
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM erlang_cpu_sup_nprocs WITH KEY = "device_id";

title: BEAM VM
